name: Parasect
author: Oswaldo KATO
flavor_text: Mushroom-lacking specimens of this Pokémon lie unmoving in the forest, lending credence to the hypothesis that the large mushroom is in control of Parasect’s actions.

abilities.name: Lethargy Spores
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may make both Active Pokémon Asleep and Poisoned.

attacks.name: X-Scissor
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.
